items.title: Sophisticated Phishing Email Targeting Business Users , github,1,2,3
items.summary: A new wave of phishing emails is targeting business professionals with fake Microsoft Office 365 login pages. These emails appear to come from legitimate sources and use convincing branding to steal credentials.
red_flags: Links that don't match the claimed destination
what_to_do: Always verify sender through alternate communication
Hover over links to check actual destinations
Type URLs directly instead of clicking links
Report suspicious emails to IT security
